original_text: And he had an helmet of brass upon his head, and he was armed with a coat of mail; and the weight of the coat was five thousand shekels of brass.
korean_text: 머리에는 놋 투구를 썼고 몸에는 비늘 갑옷을 입었으니 그 갑옷의 무게가 놋 오천 세겔이며

sentences.original_text: And he had an helmet of brass upon his head
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 머리에 놋 투구를 쓰고 있었고

sentences.original_text: and he was armed with a coat of mail
and the weight of the coat was five thousand shekels
